compound_origins.gui.badge.primary: Activate by pressing the primary ability button.
compound_origins.gui.badge.secondary: Toggle by pressing the secondary ability button.
compound_origins.gui.badge.secondaryActi: Activate by pressing the secondary ability button.
compound_origins.gui.badge.fly: Press the jump key [Space] in the air to glide. While gliding, hold the forward key [W] to accelerate - this drains your hunger bar.
compound_origins.gui.badge.right_click_e: Press the interact key (right mouse click) on the desired block with an empty hand.
compound_origins.gui.badge.teleport: Activate the ability while aiming at the top block of a cliff or wall to teleport on top of it.
layer.compound_origins.affinity.name: Affinity
layer.compound_origins.folk.name: Folk
layer.compound_origins.folk_variety.name: Folk variety
layer.compound_origins.talent.name: Talent
layer.compound_origins.defect.name: Defect A
layer.compound_origins.defect_b.name: Defect B
origin.compound_origins.custom_base.name: Custom Origin
origin.compound_origins.custom_base.desc: Assemble a custom origin from the Compound origins addon.
origin.compound_origins.folk_dragon.name: Dragonen
origin.compound_origins.folk_dragon.desc: You are a creature with innate flight, reminiscent of a dragon.
origin.compound_origins.folk_faun.name: Faunan
origin.compound_origins.folk_faun.descri: You are a graceful and swift ruminant-resembling creature.
origin.compound_origins.folk_lupine.name: Luamane
origin.compound_origins.folk_lupine.desc: You are a quick wolf-like night-time creature.
origin.compound_origins.folk_lizard.name: Wraitscal
origin.compound_origins.folk_lizard.desc: You are an elusive saurian creature.
origin.compound_origins.folk_octopus.des: You are a soft-bodied creature equipped with strange abilities.
origin.compound_origins.folk_slipfin.des: You are a fishy creature able to move in ways like no other.
origin.compound_origins.affinity_earth.d: The stony depths are your domain.
You overflow with life and growth.
origin.compound_origins.talent_knockback: Attacks don't knock you away as much.
origin.compound_origins.talent_superstom: You can eat grass and leaves, although you will be temporarily slowed.
origin.compound_origins.talent_cooldown_: Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 20% faster.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 20% faster.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 20% faster.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 20% faster.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 20% faster.
origin.compound_origins.talent_none.name: None
origin.compound_origins.talent_none.desc: No talent. Picking this allows choosing one less defect.
origin.compound_origins.defect_restricte: You cannot wear helmets and boots.
origin.compound_origins.defect_cooldown_: Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 40% slower.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 40% slower.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 40% slower.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 40% slower.
Your affinity-related active abilities recharge 40% slower.
power.compound_origins.feeding.name: Feeding
power.compound_origins.feeding.descripti: You replenish a bit of hunger upon killing a mob.
power.compound_origins.climbing.name: Climbing
power.compound_origins.cold_dark_freezin: When in darkness in a cold biome, you freeze.
power.compound_origins.cold_water_freezi: When in water in a cold biome, you freeze.
power.compound_origins.earth_shot.name: Stone barrage
power.compound_origins.extra_block_reach: Your block reach is 3 blocks longer.
power.compound_origins.fire_lava_immunit: You take no damage from fire and lava.
power.compound_origins.fire_shot.name: Fireball
power.compound_origins.herbivore.name: Herbivore
power.compound_origins.high_jump.name: Higher jumps
power.compound_origins.increased_hunger_: Food items replenish 50% less food points and saturation.
power.compound_origins.invisibility.name: Invisibility
power.compound_origins.invisibility.desc: You can become invisible. However, armour and equipment is unaffected. Also, you move 35% slower while invisible.
power.compound_origins.lightning_immunit: You do not take damage from lightning. The ensuing fire will still hurt you.
You can call down lightning, causing instant damage and igniting blocks.
power.compound_origins.longer_negative_e: Negative status effects last 50% longer on you.
power.compound_origins.melee_retaliation: Melee attackers get shocked for 2 damage.
You suffer more damage from fire and lava.
power.compound_origins.nature_shot.name: Poison spit
power.compound_origins.nature_shot.descr: Spit out a glob of toxic goo that inflicts several negative effects.
power.compound_origins.naturomancer_bone: You can fertilise plants without bonemeal.
power.compound_origins.night_vision.name: Night vision
power.compound_origins.night_vision.desc: You can see better in the dark.
power.compound_origins.overheating.name: Wet skin
power.compound_origins.overheating.descr: You suffer damage when in direct sunlight in a hot biome.
power.compound_origins.passive_regen.des: You replenish 1 health point every 7 seconds.
You take 4 less damage from falls.
power.compound_origins.restricted_armour: You cannot wear helmets or boots.
power.compound_origins.stone_breaker.des: You can mine blocks with your hands as if you were using a pickaxe.
power.compound_origins.superstomach.name: Superstomach
power.compound_origins.superstomach.desc: You can eat grass and leaves, but it will slow you down for a while.
power.compound_origins.telepath.name: Telepath
power.compound_origins.telepath.descript: At medium distances, you can sense other living beings, even in dark or through walls.
Being in water makes you hungry.
power.compound_origins.water_shot.name: Iceball
power.compound_origins.water_shot.descri: Throw a blob of icy water to immobilise foes.
power.compound_origins.wings.name: Wings
power.compound_origins.wings.description: You have wings, making you capable of gliding and active flight.
power.compound_origins.longer_wither.des: Wither status effect lasts 2.5 times as long.
power.compound_origins.mining_exhaustion: Exhaustion from breaking blocks is massively increased when underground.
power.compound_origins.no_fire_extinguis: You cannot extinguish fire by punching it.
power.compound_origins.gravel_digger.des: You can dig sand, gravel and other similar blocks with your hands quickly, as if using a shovel.
power.compound_origins.grovetender.name: Grovetender
power.compound_origins.grovetender.descr: You can chop wood and cut plants quickly with your hands, as if using an axe or hoe.
power.compound_origins.lava.name: Lava spit
power.compound_origins.lava.description: Launch a projectile that temporarily covers an area with lava.
power.compound_origins.air_push.name: Gust
power.compound_origins.air_push.descript: Summon a strong gust of air to push a foe away.
power.compound_origins.air_push_area.des: Summon a strong gust of air to push nearby foes away.
power.compound_origins.nature_wall.name: Wild growth
power.compound_origins.nature_wall.descr: Sprout tangled roots to temporarily block or create paths. Quick usages (5s) in close proximity (8 blocks) creates continuous walls.
power.compound_origins.stone_wall.name: Stone wall
power.compound_origins.stone_wall.descri: Form a stone wall to temporarily block foes.
power.compound_origins.water_wall.name: Ice wall
power.compound_origins.water_wall.descri: You can condense and freeze moisture into a temporary chunk of ice to block or create paths.
power.compound_origins.teleport.name: Teleport
power.compound_origins.teleport.descript: Teleport to the targeted position. 20 block range.
power.compound_origins.dodge.name: Swift reflexes
power.compound_origins.dodge.description: You have an 80% chance to avoid incoming projectile damage.
